version_description:
The classic action RPG, Inotia 4!

We searched high and low to get rid of as many bugs as we can, so you can continue on your epic journey!

Have feedback? Leave a review or drop us a line at info@com2us.com

More from Com2uS!
• Ace Fishing: Wild Catch
• Knights N Squires
• Golf Star™
• 9 Innings: 2013 Pro Baseball
• Wizcraft

And many more!

What’s newly updated

- Fixed bug on occasional disappearance of
saved data"
- Fixed error on buff icon of the protector of darkness skill
- Fixed other minor bugs

★Enjoy fun and exciting games of Com2uS★

-Homerun Battle 2- Real time baseball HOMERUN Action!
-Tiny Farm- Small and adorable farm within my palm~
-Derby Days- Be The Horse Master!
